title: US FASB Updates Crypto Regulation Allowing Firms to Use Fair-Value Accounting
description: The US Financial Accounting Standards Board (FASB) published revised rules stating that crypto assets will be represented at their fair value in accounting beginning in late 2024.

title: UK Judiciary Sets Clear Guidelines for AI in Courts and Tribunals
description: Senior judges in the United Kingdom have established comprehensive guidelines for using artificial intelligence (AI) in courts and tribunals. Aimed primarily at magistrates and judges in England and Wales, these guidelines reflect a forward-thinking approach to the evolving integration of AI in the legal domain. title: Organizations Prefer a Synergistic Approach with AI and Human Analysts to Safeguard Their Supply Chains
description: In an era where the digital landscape is constantly evolving, organizations find themselves at the forefront of a battle against cyber breaches in their supply chains. title: Crypto fund inflows hit 2-year high; Bitcoin whales explore new crypto AI altcoin
description: Bitcoin whales are exploring new crypto AI altcoin, InQubeta, in the ongoing presale

title: Crypto platform CoinList to pay $1.2m to settle sanctions violation charges
description: American token sale platform CoinList has agreed to pay $1.2 million to settle charges from the U.S. Department of Justice’s enforcement branch. According to a statement published by the Treasury Department’s Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) on Dec. 13,…

title: Beyond Filecoin and TRON: Why This Newcomer is Your Next Investment Opportunity

title: Memeinator vs. Orbofi AI: Price Predictions – Which Will Dominate the Market?
description: The advent of Pepe Coin heralded a resurgence for the meme coin sector, one that has captivated the crypto market. title: Breaking: Bitcoin and Stablecoins Will Rise Dramatically in 2024: Analyst
description:
Ryan Rasmussen, a senior researcher at Bitwise Invest, speculated a rise in the revenue of Ethereum, asserting that the revenue would double to $5 billion in 2024. The analyst has also pointed out his anticipations of Coinbase’s revenue hike in light of its newly launched products that have received wide acceptance. The analyst shared a […]
